io.mpos.transactions
Interface Transaction

public interface Transaction

A transaction contains all information required to make a transaction. It goes through specifically defined states and offers additional details after successful execution

Since:
2.0.0

Method Summary

          Information whether the transaction can currently be aborted.

setCustomIdentifier

void setCustomIdentifier(java.lang.String customIdentifier)
An identifier that can be set by the developer/user. Must be in the range [0-9a-tA-Z]. This will normally be a reference to a order in your system.

Parameters:
customIdentifier - The custom identifier
Since:
2.0.0

getCustomIdentifier

java.lang.String getCustomIdentifier()

Returns:
The custom identifier

2.0.0

getCreatedTimestamp

setLocationInformation

void setLocationInformation(double longitude,
                            double latitude,
                            double horizontalAccuracy)
Attaches location information to the transaction.

Parameters:
longitude - The longitude in degrees.
latitude - The latitude in degrees.

canBeAborted

boolean canBeAborted()
Information whether the transaction can currently be aborted.

Returns:
True if the transaction allows an abort, false respectively.
